record.field: <tree string="Partner"> <field name="file" /> <field name="party" /> <field name="company" /> <field name="first_name" /> <field name="last_name" /> <field name="dni" /> <field name="nationality" /> <field name="marital_status" /> <field name="incorporation_date"/> <field name="payed_quotes" /> <field name="vacation_days" /> </tree>

<form string="Partner"> <notebook colspan="6"> <page string="General" id="general"> <label name="file" /> <field name="file" /> <label name="company" /> <field name="company" /> <separator string="Datos Personales" colspan="4" id='datos_personales'/> <label name="party" /> <field name="party" /> <newline/> <label name="first_name" /> <field name="first_name" /> <label name="last_name" /> <field name="last_name" /> <label name="dni" /> <field name="dni" /> <label name="nationality" /> <field name="nationality" /> <label name="marital_status" /> <field name="marital_status" /> <separator string="Incorporacion" colspan="4" id='incorporacion_coop'/> <label name="incorporation_date" /> <field name="incorporation_date" /> <label name="payed_quotes" /> <field name="payed_quotes" /> </page> <page string="Vacations" id="vacations"> <label name="vacation_days" /> <field name="vacation_days" /> <newline/> <label name="vacation" /> <field name="vacation" /> </page> <page string="Meetings" id= "meetings"> <label name="meeting" /> <field name="meeting" /> </page> </notebook> </form>
